entries.title: Adani Crisis Disrupts India's Parliament
entries.description: Opposition parties are calling for a probe into allegations of fraud against companies linked to Indian billionaire Gautam Adani.

entries.title: Powerful Earthquakes Strike Turkey and Syria, Killing More Than 1,600 People
entries.description: A 7.8-magnitude quake was felt across the Middle East, followed by a series of aftershocks and then a second temblor of magnitude 7.5.

entries.title: China Confirms Second Balloon Over Latin America
entries.description: Beijing confirmed that China was the source of a balloon detected flying over Latin America, describing it in similar terms to the suspected surveillance balloon that the U.S. shot down.

entries.title: Israeli Military Kills Five Militants Near Jericho as Violence Spreads
entries.description: The arrest raid targeting Hamas members in the Aqbat Jabr refugee camp near Jericho was the second such event in little over a week as violence escalates in the occupied West Bank.

entries.title: EU's Top Diplomat Says Iranian Deal Is Only Way to Stop Tehran's Nuclear Program
entries.description: Foreign-policy chief Josep Borrell sees no good alternative to reviving a nuclear deal with Iran, even as the Biden administration shifts focus.

entries.title: Ukraine Warns Russia Is Planning Major Offensive as Kyiv Shakes Up Military Leadership
entries.description: Ukraine warned that Russia was completing preparations for a major new offensive this month as Kyiv signaled a reshuffle in its military leadership amid a corruption scandal that has rocked the Defense Ministry.

entries.title: Hong Kong Opposition on Trial in Landmark National-Security Case
entries.description: Defendants face up to life in prison, drawing global scrutiny as Hong Kong’s government launches a marketing blitz aimed at restoring the city’s reputation as a business hub.

entries.title: Powerful Earthquake Strikes Turkey With Fears of High Casualties
entries.description: The 7.8-magnitude earthquake destroyed dozens of buildings in the country’s worst seismic event in years.

entries.title: Prior Chinese Balloon Incursions Over U.S. Went Undetected
entries.description: Officials say prior intrusions by surveillance craft into the continental U.S. were likely of short duration.
